get.description: Get the basic health state of the system.

schema.title: Response List Available Login Schemes Api Auth List Get

307.description: Set session cookie and redirect to `target_path` page or start page.
Redirect to external OpenIDConnect provider authentikation endpoint. . After coming back the callback endpoint will set a session cookie and redirect to the webapp.
Redirect to external OpenIDConnect provider authentikation endpoint. After coming back the callback endpoint will return an API access token.

get.description:
Callback endpoint triggered after redirection from the OpenID Connect (OIDC) provider.

Depending on the login method used:
- **Session login** (`/auth/oidc/login/{provider_slug}/session`) returns a **307 Redirect** to the `target_path`.
- **Token login** (`/auth/oidc/login/{provider_slug}/token`) returns a **200 OK** with a JSON access token.

Supports both browser-based and API-based flows.

307.description: Set a session cookie and redirect to the `target_path` given to the login endpoint.

get.description: List first items of all or certain checklists. This should only be used as a bootstrap endpoint to initaly create an overview panel of all checklists. Therefor the maximum items count per checklist is limited to 32.

schema.description: Only return certain checklist items by id. If left empty all checklists will be returned.
